bisheng_code_interpreter.name: Code Interpreter
bisheng_code_interpreter.desc: Execute Python or shell code and return results within 600 seconds; suitable for math, programming, images, files, etc.

params.python_code: The pure Python script to evaluate. It will be placed in main.py. Do not use Markdown.

tianyancha_riskinfo.name: Enterprise Risk (Tianyancha)
tianyancha_riskinfo.desc: Retrieve risk information related to a company, including internal/related/alert risks

params.query: Search keyword (company name, ID, registration number, or unified social credit code)

tianyancha_company_holders.name: Company Shareholders
tianyancha_company_holders.desc: Retrieve shareholder information including name, equity ratio, capital contribution, etc.

params.query: Search keyword (company name, ID, registration number, or unified social credit code)

tianyancha_company_change_info.name: Business Registration Change Records
tianyancha_company_change_info.desc: Retrieve company business change records, including change items and before/after details

params.query: Search keyword (company name, ID, registration number, or unified social credit code)

tianyancha_ic_info.name: Industrial & Commercial Information
tianyancha_ic_info.desc: Retrieve company basic info, key personnel, shareholders, external investments, branches, etc.

params.query: Search keyword (company name, ID, registration number, or unified social credit code)

tianyancha_law_suit_case.name: Legal Litigation
tianyancha_law_suit_case.desc: Retrieve company lawsuits including case name, cause, identity, case number, etc.

tianyancha_judicial_risk.name: Judicial Risk
tianyancha_judicial_risk.desc: Retrieve lawsuits, court announcements, hearings, dishonest persons, enforcement info, case filings, delivery notices, etc.

tianyancha_ip_rights.name: Intellectual Property
tianyancha_ip_rights.desc: Retrieve IP-related info including trademarks, patents, copyrights, software copyrights, and website filings

tianyancha_get_company_baseinfo.name: Company Basic Information
tianyancha_get_company_baseinfo.desc: Retrieve basic info including company name, type, establishment date, status, registered capital, legal rep., etc.

tianyancha_search_company.name: Search Companies
tianyancha_search_company.desc: Retrieve a list of companies matching a keyword, including name, type, date, status, credit code, etc.

tianyancha_all_companys_by_company.name: Person’s Related Companies
tianyancha_all_companys_by_company.desc: Retrieve all companies associated with a person (as legal rep., shareholder, senior management)

jina_get_markdown.desc: Crawl target URL (PDF supported) and convert to Markdown for LLM processing

web_search.name: Web Search

dalle_image_generator.name: DALL·E 3 Image Generator
dalle_image_generator.desc: Generate image based on text description

fire_search_crawl.desc: Crawl target website and all accessible subpages

fire_search_scrape.name: Single Page Crawl (Scrape Mode)
fire_search_scrape.desc: Crawl only the given URL page, without subpages

silicon_flux.desc: Generate images using the Flux model

silicon_stable_diffusion.name: Stable Diffusion
silicon_stable_diffusion.desc: Generate images using Stable Diffusion model

feishu_get_chat_messages.desc: Fetch messages in direct chats, groups, or threads

get_current_time.name: Current Time
get_current_time.desc: Return the current time (defaults to UTC+8)

providerPrivateTooltip: Deploy E2B in your local environment, point the domain to your self-hosted address, and let your E2B backend handle API key authentication.
providerOfficialTooltip: Use the official E2B cloud service and obtain an API key from E2B.
timeoutTooltip: Maximum time in milliseconds the crawler waits for a page before aborting.
deepCrawlDetailConfigDescription: Advanced deep crawl settings (only affect Crawl requests)
maxdepthTooltip: Maximum crawl depth relative to the input URL.
limitTooltip: Maximum number of pages to crawl.
invalidEmailMessage: Please enter a valid email address
invalidSmtpServerMessage: Please enter a valid SMTP server address
invalidPortMessage: Please enter a valid port number
feishuAppSecretTooltip: The app secret generated by the platform when the app is created.
